# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("/home/cmaier/Hackerspaces/calliope/calliope-project-template/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_CALLIOPE-PROJECT-TEMPLATE_CPP_FILES
    "/home/cmaier/Hackerspaces/calliope/calliope-project-template/source/cereal.cpp"
    "/home/cmaier/Hackerspaces/calliope/calliope-project-template/source/main.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_CALLIOPE-PROJECT-TEMPLATE_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/home/cmaier/Hackerspaces/calliope/calliope-project-template/build/calliope-mini-classic-gcc-nosd/yotta_config.h")
set(YOTTA_AUTO_CALLIOPE-PROJECT-TEMPLATE_HEADER_FILES
    "/home/cmaier/Hackerspaces/calliope/calliope-project-template/source/cereal.h"
)
# force dependency on the config header for header files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_CALLIOPE-PROJECT-TEMPLATE_HEADER_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/home/cmaier/Hackerspaces/calliope/calliope-project-template/build/calliope-mini-classic-gcc-nosd/yotta_config.h")


add_executable (calliope-project-template
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_CALLIOPE-PROJECT-TEMPLATE_CPP_FILES}
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_CALLIOPE-PROJECT-TEMPLATE_HEADER_FILES}
)
set_target_properties(calliope-project-template PROPERTIES ENABLE_EXPORTS ON)

yotta_postprocess_target(EXECUTABLE calliope-project-template)



target_link_libraries(calliope-project-template
    microbit
)
